snippet: French Open holder Stan Wawrinka eased into the fourth round at Roland Garros with a drama-free 6-4 6-3 7-5 win over Jeremy Chardy on Friday....
lead_paragraph: French Open holder Stan Wawrinka eased into the fourth round at Roland Garros with a drama-free 6-4 6-3 7-5 win over Jeremy Chardy on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Eases Into French Open Fourth Round
headline.main: Wawrinka Eases Into French Open Fourth Round
